TextBody:
Hello Maciej,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support. I'm Rej and I'll be assisting you today.

We will need you to enable your logs to have a look at whats causing this.

Steps to enable logs:

> Open C:PingCastleEnterpriseweb.config
> Enable logs in this line:

 aspNetCore processPath="dotnet" arguments=".PingCastleEnterprise.dll" stdoutLogEnabled="True" stdoutLogFile=".logsstdout" hostingModel="InProcess" 

> Save file
> Re-run PingCastle.exe option 2
> Check logs and attach them to this email.


Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead

Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749

Ticket Number: 00443015
Ticket Subject: Pingcastle Azure Reports
Ticket Details: We recently ran pingcastle in the cloud (Azure AD) and the domain risk level shows 0/100. I'm not sure if pingcastle is scanning our prod tenants properly, but it seems overly optimistic to have a tenant risk score of zero. Only one informative rule was highlighted to look at.
Can you confirm what specifically pingcastle (in the auditor license) scans within the Azure environment? Need to consult this.

Thank you!

Rejaul Uddin
Technical Support Team Lead

TextBody:
Hello Maciej,

Thank you for the update. The following is a summary of the ticket for your records.

Issues/Concerns:


	Ran PingCastle in the cloud (Azure AD).
	Domain risk level shows 0/100, which seems overly optimistic.
	Only one informative rule was highlighted.
	Confirm what PingCastle (auditor license) scans within the Azure environment.
	Consult on the accuracy of the scan results for production tenants



Resolution
Cannot be fixed until Azure AD module is upgraded to Powershell Graph module.

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!

Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead

Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
